function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of simulation models in healthcare for testing alternate scenarios","Impact":"Inaccurate results leading to incorrect decision-making in healthcare","Mitigation":"Validation of simulation models using real-world data and continuous refinement of the models","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, AI","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Importance of data collection for reliability of vaccination process","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of vaccination outcomes and risks","Mitigation":"Implementation of standard data collection protocols, verification of data accuracy, and continuous monitoring","Technologies":"Data management systems, IoT devices, RFID technology","People":"Healthcare professionals, vaccine manufacturers","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Use of digital twin technology for digitalization of vaccination process","Impact":"Risk of cyber attacks leading to unauthorized access to vaccination data","Mitigation":"Implementation of cybersecurity measures, encryption of data, regular security audits","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption algorithms, cybersecurity software","People":"IT professionals, data security experts","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, technology companies"}]}
